info.brief_description: You and your friend start to play a... "fun" board game...
info.description:
You and your friends decide to play a board game called "Would You Rather?" It causes some interesting changes.
The characters are:
Jim White (You): Age 19, 5'8", average
Mike Thompson: Your best friend, 18, 6', strong
Jen Thompson: Mike's sister, 17, 5'7", beautiful
Sam Johnson: A good friend of yours, 19, 5'6", weak
Wendy Simpson: A friend of yours, 5'6", cute
Jordana Brown: A girl you have a crush on, 5'8", 18, very cute

There are 2 kinds of cards, orange and purple. Orange cards force you to choose something to change about yourself. Purple cards force you to choose between two other people to change.
